sql-service.update: begin insert into con_contract_headers( contract_header_id, document_number, document_desc, currency_code, amount, document_date, creation_date ) values( con_contract_headers_s.nextval, ${@document_number}, ${@document_desc}, ${@currency_code}, ${@amount}, to_date(${@document_date},'yyyy-mm-dd'), sysdate ) returning contract_header_id into ${@contract_header_id}; end;
